p.k: Peter Banning is a 40-year-old lawyer who's got it made. With the business world at his feet, workaholic Peter has lost touch with his family â€“ and his inner child. When Captain Hook from Neverland kidnaps his son and daughter, Peter has no choice but to rediscover his inner youth in a bid to save his children and what's Peter Pan without feisty pixie Tinkerbell as they make their way through Neverland?
